page.description: Retrieve external tables index tag names in a cr-lf separated list.
page.original:
TABLE.EXTERNAL_INDEX_NAME_GET() Syntax Field_List as C = TABLE.EXTERNAL_INDEX_NAME_GET( Table_Name as C ) ArgumentDescription Table_NameThe name of a table.
Description The TABLE.EXTERNAL_INDEX_NAME_GET() method returns a list of a table's indexes. Example ? table.external_index_name_get("product") = Descriptio Product_I0 Product_Id Vendor
See Also Table Functions and Methods
